name: Minish Maze Fighter
description:
I'm really having fun with this game and I'm gonna look into the full development of this game, I'm sure it'll have big changes over time, but for now here is what I have to offer :)

Controls - Arrow Keys

Upon colliding with the monsters you will destroy them.

Each monster has different effects/damage dealt.

Bat - 1 Damage

Avian - 2 Damage

Snail - Poison Damage every 3 seconds until you obtain a potion

Ghost - Subtracts 1 from your score

Mystery Pet - Counters the ghost effect and you gain 1 for killing ghost

Potion - Restore 1 health
